meanings.sent1: Yesterday, we picnicked in the park with our friends.
meanings.sent2: We often picnicked by the lake during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The ants picnicked on the crumbs we left behind.
meanings.sent4: The family picnicked under the shade of a large oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The children picnicked happily on the grassy meadow.

meanings.sent1: Last weekend, we picnicked at the beach and had a great time.
meanings.sent2: They picnicked in the mountains and enjoyed the breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels picnicked on the fallen acorns from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The memories of the picnicked moments lingered in their minds.
meanings.sent5: The couple picnicked under the starlit sky, creating lasting memories.
